manifest.ext.name: Colors-LE
manifest.ext.description: Zero Hassle Color Extraction from CSS, HTML, and JavaScript
manifest.command.extract.title: Extract Colors
manifest.command.analyze.title: Analyze Colors
manifest.command.convert.title: Convert Colors
manifest.command.filter.title: Filter Colors
manifest.command.validate.title: Validate Colors
manifest.command.dedupe.title: Deduplicate Colors
manifest.command.sort.title: Sort Colors
manifest.command.settings.title: Open Settings
manifest.command.help.title: Help & Troubleshooting
manifest.settings.title: Colors-LE Settings
manifest.settings.copy.clipboard.desc: Automatically copy extraction results to the clipboard
manifest.settings.dedupe.desc: Enable automatic deduplication of extracted colors
manifest.settings.open.side-by-side.desc: Open extraction results in a new editor to the side
manifest.settings.safety.enabled.desc: Enable safety checks for large files and operations
Warn when input file size exceeds this threshold in bytes
manifest.settings.safety.warn.large-outp: Warn before opening/copying when result lines exceed this threshold
manifest.settings.safety.warn.many-docum: Warn before opening multiple result documents when count exceeds this threshold
manifest.settings.parse-errors.desc: Show parse errors as VS Code notifications when parsing fails
manifest.settings.sort.enabled.desc: Enable automatic sorting of extracted colors
manifest.settings.sort.mode.desc: Selects how results are sorted when sorting is enabled
manifest.settings.statusbar.enabled.desc: Show Colors-LE status bar entry for quick access
manifest.settings.telemetry.desc: Enable local-only telemetry logs to the Output panel
manifest.settings.csv.streaming.desc: Enable streaming mode for large CSV files to reduce memory usage
manifest.settings.open.new-file.desc: Open post-processing results in a new file
manifest.settings.performance.max-durati: Maximum allowed operation duration in milliseconds
manifest.settings.performance.max-memory: Maximum allowed memory usage in bytes
manifest.settings.performance.max-cpu.de: Maximum allowed CPU usage in microseconds
manifest.settings.performance.min-throug: Minimum required throughput in colors per second
Maximum cache size for performance optimization
runtime.help.title: Colors-LE Help
runtime.help.quick-start:
1. Open a CSS, HTML, or JavaScript file
2. Run "Colors-LE: Extract Colors"
3. View extracted colors in results
runtime.help.commands:
**Extract Colors**: Extract from current document
**Sort Colors**: Sort by hue, saturation, lightness, or hex
**Deduplicate Colors**: Remove duplicate colors
**Settings**: Configure options
runtime.help.formats:
**Supported**: CSS, HTML, JavaScript, TypeScript
**Color Formats**: Hex (#FF0000), RGB, RGBA, HSL, HSLA
runtime.help.troubleshooting:
**No colors found?** Check file format and color syntax
**Performance issues?** Enable safety settings for large files
**Need help?** Check Output panel for details
runtime.help.settings:
Access via Command Palette: "Colors-LE: Open Settings"
Key settings: Copy to clipboard, deduplication, sorting mode, safety checks
